EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Executive_Dinner_Houston_Q116.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: You are confirmed!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for our special private event on Thursday, February 25, 2016. Please see event details below.
Date: February 25, 2016 Time: 6:30 PM Location: Pappas Bros. Steakhouse <[[https://www.google.com/maps/dir/]]>, Houston Galleria, 5839 Westheimer Rd., Houston, Texas 77057
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
We look forward to you joining us! The Pivotal Team
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:pivotal-operations@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/driving-increased-revenue-and-profitability/houston]]>.
